steps.name: Given I have a basic DbAwareDeployable
And I have a custom resource of kind TestResource with name 'my-app'
And I have requested a requirement for a Database capability
and a basic DbAwareContainer using the image 'test/my-spring-boot-image:6.3.2'
And there is a controller to process requests for the DBMS capability requested
When the controller processes a new TestResource
Then a database capability was provided for the DbAwareDeployable with a name reflecting that it is the default PostgreSQL DBMS in the namespace
And a database preparation Pod was run for the DbAwareDeployable

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a controller developer, I would like to request the Database capability so that I can deploy containers that use the database
